name: Gupptune
description:
A random dungeon style game made in a week for the GBJAM 9

Help gupp to escape from the forest in which he is trapped, but be careful, because you will have to fight against a large number of insects that are looking for food!

  • Use the arrow keys to move the player and aim with your sword
  • Use 'S' to attack
  • Use 'A' to set an objective
